Name: Dragon Boar and Lady Rabbit
About the game: help Lady Rabbit to recover the carrots, through her I think Lady Rabbit will be able to find the carrots, you will have to recover them all. But you will not be alone, Lady Rabbit will be helped by a lazy boar and a skilled dragon named Dargo. key Features : * Created by the influence of the Master System games * Relive a classic and nostalgic gameplay through the reconstruction of a CRT monitor * Choose to play with the mode you prefer, you can select a style 80 or 70 years. * Use the strength of Lady Rabbit's desire to find carrots * A lazy boar and a skilled dragon will help you in the course of the adventure.
